mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "The Ideal Square Dancer", "Discovery", "Style Lab: Grand Sweep", "Square Dancing in Turkey", "Hall of Fame: Bob Ruff", "Advancing Dancing", "1982 Premium Records", "Fashion Feature", "Ladies On The Square", "Square Dancing in Sweden", "Meet the Goodmans", "Recognition", "Meet the Advertisers", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Open Sesame", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers: Ted & Barbara May", "Callers Notebook", "Traditional Treasury", "Contra Corner", "National Convention", "Round the World", "Experimental Notes", "Workshop Feature Caller: Eddie Mayall", "Ammunition", "From the Floor", "Caller of the Month: Hayes Herschler", "On the Record", "Current Releases", and "Date Book".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
